![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/9d414d04bca9e27fa1bf1c9697970285.png)

We can take apart $\green{3}$ to make $\pink2$ and $\blue1$.  
We can put together $\pink2$ and $\blue1$ to make $\green{3}$.

question.content:
**Fill in the blanks.**  

 | | |
:-: | :-: | :-:
$3-2=$ [[☃ input-number 1]] | because | [[☃ input-number 2]] $+$ $2=3$
